description: Implementation of NoteService interface handling CRUD operations for Note entities, using Spring Data JPA.

classes.name: NoteServiceImpl
classes.description: Service class implementing NoteService, managing Note entities with database interactions.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new Note entity from the provided request and saves it to the database.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Retrieves all Note entities from the database.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Retrieves a Note by its ID, returns an Optional.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Note identified by ID with data from NoteRequest; throws NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a Note by its ID, throws NotFoundException if the Note does not exist.
